metadata.title: Regina Caeli
metadata.description: Easter season antiphon to Mary, celebrating the Resurrection
metadata.origin: Traditional Easter season antiphon in the Roman Catholic liturgy
metadata.usage: Recited during the Easter season, especially at Compline (Night Prayer)

la.text: Regina caeli, laetare, alleluia: Quia quem meruisti portare, alleluia. Resurrexit, sicut dixit, alleluia. Ora pro nobis Deum, alleluia.
la.notes: Traditional Latin version used in the Roman Catholic liturgy during Easter season

en.text: Queen of heaven, rejoice, alleluia. For He whom you did merit to bear, alleluia. Has risen, as He said, alleluia. Pray for us to God, alleluia.
en.notes: English translation commonly used in Catholic prayer during Easter season

es.text: Reina del cielo, alégrate, aleluya: Porque el que mereciste llevar, aleluya. Ha resucitado como dijo, aleluya. Ruega por nosotros a Dios, aleluya.
es.notes: Spanish Catholic liturgical version for Easter season

fr.text: Reine du ciel, réjouis-toi, alléluia : Car Celui que tu as mérité de porter, alléluia. Il est ressuscité comme il l'avait dit, alléluia. Prie pour nous auprès de Dieu, alléluia.
fr.notes: French Catholic liturgical version for Easter season

de.text: Königin des Himmels, freue dich, Halleluja: Denn der, den du zu tragen würdig warst, Halleluja. Er ist auferstanden, wie er gesagt hat, Halleluja. Bitte für uns Gott, Halleluja.
de.notes: German Catholic liturgical version for Easter season

it.text: Regina del cielo, rallegrati, alleluia: Perché colui che hai meritato di portare, alleluia. È risorto come ha detto, alleluia. Prega per noi Dio, alleluia.
it.notes: Italian Catholic liturgical version for Easter season

pt.text: Rainha do céu, alegra-te, aleluia: Porque Aquele que mereceste levar, aleluia. Ressuscitou como disse, aleluia. Ora por nós a Deus, aleluia.
pt.notes: Portuguese Catholic liturgical version for Easter season

pl.text: Królowo nieba, wesel się, alleluja: Bo Ten, któregoś nosić była godna, alleluja. Zmartwychwstał, jako rzekł, alleluja. Módl się za nami do Boga, alleluja.
pl.notes: Polish Catholic liturgical version for Easter season
